resources.string: Most common use case of MagicViews is to create a layout resource with custom views and custom properties, like this one.
Every MagicView can also be added to the layout from the code. Same properties can be set as in layout resource.
Spans can be used to modify parts of the text. With MagicFontSpan, parts of the text can have different font. This can be applicable to both MagicViews and default views.
This is a MagicTextView. Even though font is set, it can be overridden by using MagicFontSpan.
This is a normal TextView. MagicFontSpan is not exclusive to MagicViews, it can also be used on normal views.
Just as any view, MagicViews can be used as part of other compound views. Using them does not break the preview.
